title: Physics simulation input file
description: The initial state of the force fields and particles used by the physics simulation.

theta.description: The theta value used for the Barnes-Hut algorithm

tick size.description: The time increment of the simulation, measured in seconds(s).

num ticks.description: The duration of the simulation as measured in ticks.

gravitational field.description: The constant gravitational field as 3D vector, measured in newtons per kilogram(N/kg).

electric field.description: The constant electric field as a 3D vector, measured in newtons per coulomb(N/C).

magnetic field.description: The constant magnetic field as 3D vector, measured in teslas(T).

particles.description: The point particles used in the simulation.

items.description: A point particle with a specified position, charge, and mass.
